thread.title: Rory McGrath admits stalking woman in Cambridge
thread.title_full: Rory McGrath admits stalking woman in Cambridge

title: Rory McGrath admits stalking woman in Cambridge
text:
Rory McGrath admits stalking woman in Cambridge 26 January 2017 Image caption Rory McGrath admitted a stalking charge when he appeared before magistrates Television personality Rory McGrath has admitted stalking a woman for more than a year. 
McGrath, 60, of Grantchester Street, Cambridge, pleaded guilty at Huntingdon Magistrates' Court, in Cambridgeshire. 
He had been charged with following the woman, sending electronic messages and approaching her in the street. 
In November McGrath denied a charge of stalking without causing fear, alarm or distress, but he changed his plea on the first day of his trial. 
The offences happened in Cambridge between June 2015 and August last year.
